file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-27-05-04 - CONFIG-2 - MAIN DOOR CURTAIN - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAIN DOOR CURTAIN - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the main door curtain. B. The main door curtain is installed in the entry area of the passenger cabin, at zone 231. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ACFT MODEL(S) 25-27-05-000-801-A CURTAIN - REMOVAL EMB-135 ACFT MODEL(S) 25-27-05-400-801-A CURTAIN - INSTALLATION EMB-135 EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-2 25-27-05 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-27-05-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 2. CURTAIN - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to remove the main door curtain. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 01 Does the task Passenger cabin H. Removal SUBTASK 020-014-B (1) Remove the main door curtain as follows (Figure 401): (a) Loosen the snap button (10) that attach the main door curtain assembly (6) to the ceiling panel (11). (b) Loosen the snap buttons (8) that attach the main door curtain assembly (6) to the end cap assembly (9). (c) Loosen the hook & loop/D-ring fastener strap (14) to release the main door curtain assembly (6) to the LH windscreen, or to the LH wardrobe, or to LH galley, as applicable. (d) Put the main door curtain assembly (6) in the open position. (e) Remove the screws (12) and washers (13) that attach the hook & loop/D-ring fastener straps to the LH windscreen, or from the LH wardrobe, or from LH galley, as applicable. (f) Remove the screws (2) and (4) and the washers (1) and (5) that attach the curtain track assembly (3). (g) Loosen the curtain from the hook & loop fastener (7). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 25-27-05 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (h) Remove the main door curtain assembly (6). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 25-27-05 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 Main Door Curtain - Removal/Installation Figure 401 3. CURTAIN TRACK ASSEMBLY 1. WASHER 2. SCREW 4. SCREW 5. WASHER A 11. CEILING PANEL ZONE 231 6. MAIN DOOR 10. SNAP CURTAIN BUTTON 9. END CAP ASSEMBLY 7. HOOK & LOOP 8. SNAP FASTENER BUTTON B 12. WASHER 13. SCREW 7. HOOK & LOOP FASTENER 14. HOOK & LOOP/ D-RING CURTAIN TYING STRAP OPEN POSITION DET. B (TYPICAL) DET. A CLOSED POSITION DET. B EM145AMM253418A.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 25-27-05 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-27-05-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 3. CURTAIN - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to install the main door curtain. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 01 Does the task Passenger cabin H. Installation SUBTASK 420-014-B (1) Install the main door curtain as follows (Figure 401): (a) Put the main door curtain assembly (6) in the open position. (b) Attach the curtain track assembly (3) with the screws (2) and (4) and the washers (1) and (5). (c) Attach the main-door-curtain hook & loop fastener (7) to the LH windscreen, or to the wardrobe, or to LH galley, as applicable. (d) With the screws (13) and washers (12), attach the hook & loop/D-ring curtain tying straps (14) to the LH windscreen, or to the LH wardrobe, or to LH galley, as applicable. (e) Put the main door curtain assembly (6) in the closed position. (f) Use hook & loop/D-ring fastener straps (14) to fasten the main door curtain assembly (6) to the LH windscreen, or from the LH wardrobe, or from LH galley, as applicable. (g) Use the snap buttons (8) to fasten the main door curtain assembly (6) to the end cap assembly. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 25-27-05 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (h) Use the snap button (10) to fasten the main door curtain assembly (6) to the ceiling panel (11). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 25-27-05 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
